oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Obituary for James G. Moss
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Funeral Is Held for James G. Moss - Funeral services for James G. Moss were to be held Friday afternoon from the Oklahoma Confederate home by Rev. George W. Lewis. Burial at Rose Hill will be directed by the Bettes funeral home. Ross was 80 years old. His death occurred Wednesday."
